issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.debug.Utils explicitly import com.sun.management.HotSpotDiagnosticMXBean which is not supported by IBM JDK.
So we can make HotSpotDiagnosticMXBean as runtime but not compile.
fields.summary: Hive exec module won't compile with IBM JDK

comments.body: DUMP_HEAP_METHOD.invoke needs a null check. Also the exception could be logged in case of error (or at least the message from it). Otherwise, looks good.

[~sershe]
Updated the patch, please take a look, thanks for your kindly review.
